page.title: 06SCHOOLS IN NORTH YATE
page.content: Yate C.P.School is very small compared with most modern schools.It is 135 years old.It was the old school that served the old village of Yate before any of the new housing estates were built.At the school,children do maths, english,science, different topics,and sports.These include football,netball, rounders, nonstop cricket,gymnastics and athletics.These are some of the topics that have been studied in the last two years: Minibeasts,Mexico, Early This Century,Prehistory,Space, India,The Middle Ages,and The Domesday Project.Out of the 46 children at the school,24 have school dinners,17 have sandwiches and 5 go home to have dinner.There is one other primary school in the area and that is Iron Acton School and it is even smaller.At the age of 11,most children go to Brimsham Green Comprehensive School.
